skills.name: Interests
keywords: interaction design & user experience; data visualization

highlights: Helping create innovative product incubations for network monitoring, security, and topology mapping.
Building both an API and a consuming UI for configuring network monitoring tooling.
Helped build new security vulnerability management UI for a conference keynote launch.
Created topological map visualizations to depict system entities' health and relationships.
Developed custom business intelligence tools for salespeople to understand customer account data.
Built interfaces for enabling and configuring cloud and on-host integrations.
Built applications and sites for a variety of large clients including Nike, Google, Microsoft, and more.
Worked on an embedded team at Google to build the Python back end for a money-saving internal billing application.
Helped launch Nike's then-new events signup platform whose UI was localized in many different languages.
Created the site for the product launch for the then-new Microsoft Surface tablet.
Developed web application content and data visualizations for the first-of-its-kind Nike FuelBand activity tracker.
Promoted from Front End Solutions Architect and previously from Senior Presentation Code Developer.
Developed CMS-driven marketing websites and interactive features for Toyota, Lexus, and Scion.
Maintained and enhanced functionality for Toyota-brand car customization tools.
Built the UI for the Adobe Marketplace, which offered software extensions and add-ons for Adobe products.
Worked for large clients including Amgen and Wyeth Pharmaceuticals, Sprint, Verizon, Microsoft, and Blue Shield.
Built custom marketing websites & HTML emails, and managed & analyzed email campaigns.
